parameter.name: threshold
parameter.label: Threshold
parameter.description: Configures the detector threshold, is the min score (in range 0. to 1.) to trigger the detection.

parameter.name: averagedThreshold
parameter.label: Averaged Threshold
parameter.description: Configures the detector averaged threshold. If set to 0 this functionality is disabled.

parameter.name: scoreMode
parameter.label: Score Mode
parameter.description: Indicates how to calculate the final score. Not affect to wakeword models.

parameter.name: vadMode
parameter.label: VAD Mode
parameter.description: Enables a basic vad detector to discard some execution.

parameter.name: minScores
parameter.label: Min Scores
parameter.description: Minimum number of positive scores to consider a partial detection as a detection.

parameter.name: eager
parameter.label: Eager
parameter.description: Emit detection on min partial scores.

parameter.name: scoreRef
parameter.label: Score Ref
parameter.description: Value used to calculate the score as a percent in range 0 - 1.

parameter.name: bandSize
parameter.label: Band Size
parameter.description: Configures the band-size for the comparator used to match the wakeword refs. Not affect to wakeword models.

parameter.name: record
parameter.label: Record on Partial Detections
parameter.description: Create wav record on the first partial detections and any other one that surpasses its score.

parameter.name: gainNormalizer
parameter.label: Gain Normalizer
parameter.description: Enables an audio filter that intent to approximate the volume of the stream to a reference level (RMS of the samples is used as volume measure).

parameter.name: minGain
parameter.label: Min Gain
parameter.description: Min gain applied by the gain normalizer filter.

parameter.name: maxGain
parameter.label: Max Gain
parameter.description: Max gain applied by the gain normalizer filter.

parameter.name: gainRef
parameter.label: Gain Ref
parameter.description: Set the RMS reference used by the gain-normalizer to calculate the gain applied. If unset an estimation of the wakeword level is used.

parameter.name: bandPass
parameter.label: Band Pass
parameter.description: Enables an audio filter that attenuates frequencies outside the low cutoff and high cutoff range.

parameter.name: lowCutoff
parameter.label: Low Cutoff
parameter.description: Low cutoff for the band-pass filter.

parameter.name: highCutoff
parameter.label: High Cutoff
parameter.description: High cutoff for the band-pass filter.
